title: [Large-Scale] Development of a Sustainable Product Design and Manufacturing Education Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering concepts and general understanding of environmental sustainability
context.additional_context: A course strengthening instructional design competencies for pre-service/in-service teachers by integrating sustainable product design methodologies into language education

learning_goals: Students can explain a product design process that considers economic, environmental, and social sustainability factors
Students can analyze the impact of manufacturing processes on product sustainability using digital tools
Students can develop sustainable product design prototypes through team-based collaboration in a PBL environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
